# rawAuthenticatorData

**Instance Property**

A byte sequence that contains additional information about the credential.

## Declaration

```swift
var rawAuthenticatorData: Data! { get }
```

## Discussion

This authenticator data object contains additional information about the credential. To learn more, see the [https://www.w3.org/TR/webauthn-2/#authenticator-data].

## Getting the properties

- **signature**: The signature for the assertion.
- **userID**: A user identifier for the assertion.

items.description: A user identifier for the assertion.
items.name: userID
